title: Bloomberg Markets: Feldman on Target Turnaround
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Feldman on Target Turnaround
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Joseph Feldman Senior Managing Director and Retail Analyst Telsey Advisory Group Discussing Target earnings and the early stages of its business transformation with significant investment required across all areas of the enterprise—stores, online, merchandising, pricing, labor, customer service, and supply chain.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
